mapper.select:
select t1.pj_seq, t1.ch_seq, t1.pj_name, t1.pj_img, t1.pj_memo, t1.pj_content, t1.fd_st_dt, t1.fd_end_dt,
concat(to_char(t1.fd_st_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'~',to_char(t1.fd_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as fd_range_dt,
(case when (t1.fd_st_dt <= now() AND t1.fd_end_dt >= now()) then '진행중' else '종료' end) as active, to_char(t1.cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt, t1.cret_id, t1.updt_dt, t1.updt_id, t2.ch_name, t3.sumFdAmt, t3.fundingCount, t4.nickname from web.project t1 left outer join web.channel t2 on t1.ch_seq = t2.ch_seq left outer join (select pj_seq, sum(fd_amt) as sumFdAmt, count(*) as fundingCount from web.project_funding group by pj_seq) t3 on t1.pj_seq = t3.pj_seq left outer join web.member t4 on t1.cret_id = t4.id order by t1.cret_dt desc

select count(*) as totalCount, (select count(*) as activeCount from web.project where fd_st_dt <= now() and fd_end_dt >= now()) as activeCount, (select count(*) as activeCount from web.project where fd_end_dt < now()) as inactiveCount from web.project

select t1.pj_seq, t1.ch_seq, t1.pj_name, t1.pj_img, t1.pj_memo, t1.pj_content, t1.fd_st_dt, t1.fd_end_dt, concat(to_char(t1.fd_st_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'~',to_char(t1.fd_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as fd_range_dt, (case when (t1.fd_st_dt <= now() AND t1.fd_end_dt >= now()) then '진행중' else '종료' end) as active, to_char(t1.cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cret_dt, t1.cret_id, t1.updt_dt, t1.updt_id, (case when(t1.active_yn = true) then 'Y' else 'N' end) as active_yn, t2.ch_name, t3.sumFdAmt, t3.fundingCount, t4.nickname from web.project t1 left outer join web.channel t2 on t1.ch_seq = t2.ch_seq left outer join (select pj_seq, sum(fd_amt) as sumFdAmt, count(*) as fundingCount from web.project_funding group by pj_seq) t3 on t1.pj_seq = t3.pj_seq left outer join web.member t4 on t1.cret_id = t4.id where 1=1
AND
t1.pj_name like '%' || #{item} || '%'
t4.nickname LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
t1.pj_name LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' or t4.nickname LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
AND
(t1.fd_st_dt <= now() and t1.fd_end_dt > now())
(t1.fd_st_dt > now() or t1.fd_end_dt < now())
order by t1.cret_dt desc
mapper.insert: insert into web.project ( ch_seq, pj_name, pj_img, pj_memo, pj_content, fd_st_dt, fd_end_dt, cret_dt, cret_id, updt_dt, updt_id ) values ( ${chSeq}, #{pjName}, #{pjImg}, #{pjMemo}, #{pjContent}, #{fdStDt}::timestamp , #{fdEndDt}::timestamp, #{cretDt}::timestamp , #{cretId}, #{updtDt}::timestamp, #{updtId} )
mapper.update: update web.project set pj_name = #{pjName}, pj_img = #{pjImg}, pj_memo = #{pjMemo}, fd_st_dt = #{fdStDt}::timestamp , fd_end_dt = #{fdEndDt}::timestamp , updt_dt = #{updtDt}::timestamp, updt_id = #{updtId} where pj_seq = ${pjSeq}
